Comments_List: Great course on real-world application of doctoral work.  I am so grateful to have a course that supports career development at the outset of our doctoral study.  I learned so much about maximizing my experience at Yale while planning for the future.
An overall better understanding of the publication process and academic life.

Very good foundational knowledge about career development. The course provided a really good overview about what to expect throughout the graduate research assistantship program and throughout the doctoral program.  

Having to write out GRA objectives for the semester (and evaluation of goals) was really helpful to organize GRA work for the semester.
